underweightmessage: A BMI of lower than 18.5 indicates that you are underweight. To maintain a healthier bmi, you need to use more nutrients and do exercises daily.
normalmessage: A BMI of 18.5-24.9 indicates that you are at a healthy weight for your height. By maintaing a healthy weight, you lower your risk of developing serious health problems.
overweightmessage: A BMI of between 25-29.9 indicates that you are overweight. There is a risk of diabetes are several other health problems. Try to eat less and exercise more often.
obesemessage: A BMI of over 40 indicates that you are obese. This is a very serious health condition that can result in serious health problems. Try visiting a doctor and following a diet to lose weight.
